name: PrayerTime
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: muslim prayer
des:
The skill plays the Athan / Adhan / Adan (Muslim call to prayer) when prompted. Please note that the skill only plays the Adhan when the skill is manually started or setup to run using a routine within Alexa app that is triggered at a given time or by a third party app.
Note : The skill content is in Arabic i.e. the skill plays the Adhan / Athan / Azan in the Arabic language.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
